flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: It is said that through meditation,nMEDICHAM heightens energy insidenits body and sharpens its sixth sense.fThis POKéMON hides its presence bynmerging itself with fields andnmountains.
Through the power of meditation,nMEDICHAM developed its sixth sense.nIt gained the ability to usefpsychokinetic powers. This POKéMON isnknown to meditate for a whole monthnwithout eating.
Through crushingly harsh yoga training, itngained the power to foretell its foe’snactions. It battles with elegant, dance-nlike movement.
It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-nlike steps, then launches a devastatingnblow in the same motion.
It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-nlike steps, then launches a devastatingnblow in the same motion.
Through yoga training, it hasnhoned its sixth sense. Itsnmovements are elegant.
Through daily meditation, it honesnits spiritual power. It can sensenwhat others are thinking.
It gains the ability to see the auranof its opponents by honing its mindnthrough starvation.
Through yoga training, it gainednthe psychic power to predictnits foe’s next move.
Through yoga training, it gainednthe psychic power to predictnits foe’s next move.
Le jeûne lui permet de concentrernson esprit au point de décelernl’aura de ses adversaires.
It gains the ability to see the auranof its opponents by honing its mindnthrough starvation.
Le jeûne lui permet de concentrernson esprit au point de décelernl’aura de ses adversaires.
It gains the ability to see the auranof its opponents by honing its mindnthrough starvation.
It gains the ability to see the auranof its opponents by honing its mindnthrough starvation.
It gains the ability to see the auranof its opponents by honing its mindnthrough starvation.
ダンスの　ような　ゆうがな　うごきでnこうげきを　かわして　きょうれつなnいちげきを　あいてに　おみまいする。
춤추는 듯한 우아한 움직임으로n공격을 피하며 상대에게n강력한 일격을 선사한다.
Charmina évite les attaques en exécutant d’élégantsnpas de danse avant de lancer une attaque dévastatricendans son élan.
Es weicht Attacken elegant tänzerisch aus,num anschließend eine verheerende Attacke ausnderselben Bewegung heraus zu lancieren.
Evita los ataques moviéndose de forma elegante,ncomo si bailara. Ataca dando un golpe devastador ynmoviéndose igual.
Evita elegantemente gli attacchi a passo di danza, pernpoi lanciare devastanti attacchi con la stessa grazia.
It elegantly avoids attacks with dance-like steps,nthen launches a devastating blow in thensame motion.
ダンスの　ような　優雅な　動きでn攻撃を　交わして　強烈な　一撃をn相手に　お見舞いする。
ヨガの　しゅぎょうで　きたえられたnサイコパワーで　あいての　うごきをnよそくする　ことが　できるのだ。
요가 수행으로 단련된n사이코 파워로 상대의 움직임을n예상할 수 있다.
Ses pouvoirs psy, renforcés par la pratique du yoga,nlui permettent de prédire les mouvements ennemis.
Mit Yoga-Training hat es seine Psycho-Kräfte geschärftnund ahnt so die Attacken seiner Gegner voraus.
Puede prever los movimientos de su rival usando susnpoderes psíquicos, fortalecidos por el yoga.
Conosce le mosse del nemico grazie ai poteri dinpreveggenza ottenuti con le pratiche yoga.
Through yoga training, it gained the psychic powernto predict its foe’s next move.
ヨガの　修行で　鍛えられたnサイコパワーで　相手の　動きをn予測する　ことが　できるのだ。
めいそうする　ことで　からだの　エネルギーがnたかまり　だい６かんが　するどくなる　という。nのやまと　いったいになって　けはいを　けす。
명상을 하면 몸의 에너지가 높아지고n여섯 번째 감각이 예리해진다고 한다.n산야와 일체화되어 기척을 지운다.
On dit que grâce à la méditation, Charmina stockende l’énergie dans son corps et affine son sixième sens.nCe Pokémon se cache des autres en se fondant dansnles champs et les montagnes.
Mittels Meditation erhöht Meditalis seine Körperenergie undnschärft seinen sechsten Sinn. Dieses Pokémon verbirgt sich,nindem es eins mit den Feldern und Bergen wird.
Dicen que, a través de la meditación, Medicham aumenta sunenergía interior y agudiza su sexto sentido. Este Pokémonnsuele pasar desapercibido mimetizándose con el campo y lasnmontañas.
Si dice che, grazie alla meditazione, Medicham incrementinla propria energia fisica e affini il sesto senso. Si nascondenefficacemente mimetizzandosi nei campi e in montagna.
It is said that through meditation, Medicham heightens energyninside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This Pokémonnhides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.
めいそうする　ことで　体の　エネルギーがn高まり　第６感が　鋭くなる　という。n野山と　一体になって　気配を　消す。
ヨガの　ちからで　だい６かんが　はったつしてnサイコパワーを　あやつれる　ように　なった。n１かげつかん　なにも　たべずに　めいそうする。
요가의 힘으로 제6의 감각이 발달하여n사이코 파워를 다룰 수 있게 되었다.n1개월간 아무것도 먹지 않고 명상한다.
Grâce au pouvoir de la méditation, Charmina a développénson sixième sens. Il peut utiliser des pouvoirs télékinétiques.nOn sait que ce Pokémon peut méditer pendant un mois sansnmanger.
Mittels Meditation hat Meditalis seinen sechsten Sinnnentwickelt. So kann es seine psychokinetischen Kräftennutzen. Dieses Pokémon meditiert einen ganzen Monat,nohne etwas zu essen.
A través de la meditación, Medicham desarrolló su sextonsentido y aprendió a usar poderes psicoquinéticos. Se sabenque este Pokémon puede pasarse un mes meditando y sinncomer.

Grazie alla propria abilità meditativa Medicham ha sviluppatonil sesto senso. Ha acquisito anche la capacità di usare i poterinpsicocinetici. È noto per rimanere fermo in meditazionenun mese intero senza mangiare.
Through the power of meditation, Medicham developed itsnsixth sense. It gained the ability to use psychokinetic powers.nThis Pokémon is known to meditate for a whole monthnwithout eating.
ヨガの　力で　第６感が　発達してnサイコパワーを　操れる　ように　なった。n１ヶ月間　なにも　食べずに　めいそうする。
